channel.title: Microsoft Dynamics GP on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Dynamics GP on 0x000216

item.title: Where, oh where did my budget disappear to?
item.description:
Nearing the end of the first quarter, many users begin adjusting their budgets and forecasts for the rest of the year. It’s common for users to accidentally delete or modify their budgets, so it’s important to review some guidelines for using budget windows in Microsoft Dynamics GP. Let’s start with the Budget Maintenance window, accessed through Cards»Financial»Budget, then choosing either Open»Using Microsoft Dynamics GP or New»Using Microsoft Dynamics GP. It’s crucial to remember that this window modifies the ENTIRE BUDGET unless a specific range is selected using the Ranges button...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/where-oh-where-did-my-budget-disappear-to/

item.title: Summary of Payroll Audit SmartList POW!
item.description:
Last week, I was asked to create a report that summarized payroll amounts and hours by pay code. This report would be used as a final check before printing paychecks, ensuring accuracy after payroll calculation. Using SmartList Builder, we created the report in minutes! Here’s how: Navigate to the SmartList Builder: Microsoft Dynamics GP » Tools » SmartList Builder » SmartList Builder. Input a SmartList ID, Name, and Item Name. Select Product: Microsoft Dynamics GP, Series: Payroll...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/summary-of-payroll-audit-smartlist-pow/
